com.ftm.iamcore.services.dao

Interface DAO<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - any object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateDAO

    public interface DAO<T>
    CRUD interface, takes a type T to create a generic implementation.
    Author:
    Favio
